name: iFruitBomb 4 - The Fruit Machine Simulator
description:
iFruitBomb 4 is a fruit machine simulator with a stack of features providing single/multi-player gaming. This all new fruit machine now features wireless multiplayer mayhem. Play in full screen high resolution graphics on iPad and iPhone/iPod Touch with retina display. Also supports non retina display models.

Features include:

Single player Tournament Mode: Play against computer controlled opponents in a timed race to cash out with the most winnings.

Multi-player Credit Play and Tournament Mode: Supports play for up to 4 people on the same device.

All New Multi-player Wireless Tournament Mode: Supports wireless play for up to 4 devices in timed tournaments.

Based on the latest Dual Screen Digital Fruit Machines found in UK Pubs and Arcades.

Skill based sub games include Feeding Frenzy, Match A Million, Cash Bash, Arctic Antics, Money Maze, Mega Wonga and many more.

Created with the help and advice of Professional Fruit Machine Designers and Manufacturers operating in the UK.

All the features of a Dual Screen, £70 Jackpot UK Category C AWP in the palm of your hand.

FREE TO PLAY after the initial purchase (Upgrades are available via In-App Purchases if required).

Play in classic 3D (full machine) vertical view, or the all new 2D/3D side-on HUD view.

60 FPS gaming providing silky smooth graphics on the latest devices.

A stack of hidden features typically found in UK fruit machines such as the hidden holds on re-spin, no-hold holds after nudges etc.

All the favourites found in real fruit machines such as Nudges, Bonus Plays, Number Trails, Feature Trails, Hold Overs, Feature Exchanges.

High Resolution Graphics on devices with retina display and iPad. Now also includes support for iPhone 5 retina display.

Online Leader Boards, and a host of Trophies to unlock.

Now also includes Cashpots, Virtual Stake changes (including uplift and gameplay enhancements for higher Virtual Stake Play in Credit play mode via in-app purchase), and Virtual Credit Transfers (Just like a real machine, allows extra credit to be transferred to play in Credit play mode, purchased in-app).
